pullrequest.title: install haptix gazebo plugins to standard library location.

content.raw:
I think that if we do this change, we'll need the `setup.sh` to make sure that the plugin is found if you're not installing in a default location.

The `setup,sh` is not generated right now. [In this branch](#!/osrf/handsim/branches/compare/issue_96_caguero%0Dissue_96#diff), I generated the file.

We're currently installing the models and resources in `.../share/gazebo-<GAZEBO_VERSION>`. Haptix will break if we update the Gazebo major version after installing Haptix.

I propose to tackle it in a different pull request.
